title: ‘Squid Game’ Is Coming Back for Season Two, Creator Says
sub_head: Hwang Dong-hyuk says there’s demand for another season following the show’s success; date isn’t yet set
body:
A second season of Netflix Inc.’s popular series, “Squid Game,” is in the works, according to the show’s creator.
Hwang Dong-hyuk, who wrote and directed the South Korean dystopian drama, told the Associated Press he’s planning a second season in his head, but that it was too early to say when it will come.
